original_text:
In that day the deaf will hear the words of the scroll,
    and out of gloom and darkness
    the eyes of the blind will see.
korean_text: 그 날에 못 듣는 사람이 책의 말을 들을 것이며 어둡고 캄캄한 데에서 맹인의 눈이 볼 것이며

sentences.original_text: the deaf will hear the words of the scroll
sentences.korean_translation: 귀머거리가 두루마리의 말씀을 듣게 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: and out of gloom and darkness
the eyes of the blind will see
